title: These great apps don’t spy or clog your phone. Also they’re not apps.
description: Meet the web app, a hybrid of an app and a website. Here’s why you should root for this underdog technology and how to try it.

title: Elizabeth Holmes, disgraced Theranos founder, to report to prison
description: The onetime tech superstar will begin serving an 11-year sentence for carrying out a massive blood-testing fraud.

title: State Department seeks to expand its space diplomacy efforts
description: The new agency document details a “strategic framework for space diplomacy.”

title: The biggest problem in AI? Lying chatbots
description: AI chatbots are everywhere, but they still routinely make up false information and pass it off as real. The problem may not be fixable.
